# Pull Request Template for Mynthra Theme

## Summary
<!-- Provide a concise summary of what this PR changes -->
Example: Adds a new syntax highlighting color variant for the Mynthra theme.

## Type of PR
- [ ] Bugfix
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Chore / Maintenance

## Description
<!-- Explain in detail what is being changed and why -->
- What is the problem / feature addressed
- How it was implemented / fixed
- Any trade-offs or notes

## Related Issues
<!-- Link any related issues, e.g., #12 -->
- Closes / relates to:

## Checklist
- [ ] Code compiles and runs without errors in VS Code
- [ ] Theme changes tested in VS Code (syntax, UI, etc.)
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, CHANGELOG, etc.)
- [ ] Version number updated if needed (theme_version in package.json)
- [ ] Follows project code style / conventions
- [ ] PR title is descriptive and clear
